docs.lead_paragraph: FOR some reason a paragrap or two about ozone in the report that Dr. C. G. Abbot prepares annually of the Smithsonian Institution's scientific activities received far more prominence last week than it deserved as a piece of news.

headline.main: THE WEEK IN SCIENCE: ESSENTIAL GASES

docs.abstract: Vacuum method of salvaging being used by M Raffaelli
docs.snippet: FOR some reason a paragrap or two about ozone in the report that Dr. C. G. Abbot prepares annually of the Smithsonian Institution's scientific activities received far more prominence last week than it deserved as a piece of news.

docs.lead_paragraph: Waste, greed, corruption, crime, inhumanity, demagogy and confusion were named last night by Joseph V. McKee, Recovery party nominee for Mayor, as the "seven deadly, vicious enemies of good government."

headline.main: M'KEE LISTS 'DEADLY SINS'; Says Tammany Is Ally of Crime, Corruption and Inhumanity. LAGUARDIA A 'DEMAGOGUE' Election Would Mean Era of 'Confusion and Theatrics,' Recovery Candidate Says. FARLEY PLEDGES SUPPORT Speaks as Voter in the Best Interests of City -- Straus Lists 12-Point Program. M'KEE WINDS UP DRIVE IN BROOKLYN

docs.snippet: Waste, greed, corruption, crime, inhumanity, demagogy and confusion were named last night by Joseph V. McKee, Recovery party nominee for Mayor, as the "seven deadly, vicious enemies of good government."
